articles.title: 'Dangerous and irresponsible': NATO condemns Putin's nuclear-arms plan - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Defense alliance ‘closely monitoring’ Russian move to deploy tactical nuclear weapons in Belarus.
articles.content:
NATO criticized Moscow on Sunday for its dangerous and irresponsible nuclear rhetoric after Russian President Vladimir Putin announced he would deploy tactical nuclear weapons to Belarus.
